00041 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00042 #  include "config.h"
00043 #endif // HAVE_CONFIG_H
00044 
00045 #include <err.h>
00046 #include <stdio.h>
00047 #include <stddef.h>
00048 #include <stdlib.h>
00049 #include <string.h>
00050 
00051 #include <nfc/nfc.h>
00052 
00053 #include "nfc-utils.h"
00054 
00055 #define MAX_DEVICE_COUNT 16
00056 #define MAX_TARGET_COUNT 16
00057 
00058 static nfc_device *pnd;
00059 
00060 static void
00061 print_usage(const char *progname)
00062 {
00063   printf("usage: %s [-v]\n", progname);
00064   printf("  -v\t verbose display\n");
00065 }
00066 
00067 int
00068 main(int argc, const char *argv[])
00069 {
00070   (void) argc;
00071   const char *acLibnfcVersion;
00072   size_t  i;
00073   bool verbose = false;
00074   int res = 0;
00075 
00076   nfc_context *context;
00077   nfc_init(&context);
00078   if (context == NULL) {
00079     ERR("Unable to init libnfc (malloc)");
00080     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00081   }
00082 
00083   // Display libnfc version
00084   acLibnfcVersion = nfc_version();
00085   printf("%s uses libnfc %s\n", argv[0], acLibnfcVersion);
00086   if (argc != 1) {
00087     if ((argc == 2) && (0 == strcmp("-v", argv[1]))) {
00088       verbose = true;
00089     } else {
00090       print_usage(argv[0]);
00091       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00092     }
00093   }
00094 
00095   /* Lazy way to open an NFC device */
00096 #if 0
00097   pnd = nfc_open(context, NULL);
00098 #endif
00099 
00100   /* If specific device is wanted, i.e. an ARYGON device on /dev/ttyUSB0 */
00101 #if 0
00102   nfc_device_desc_t ndd;
00103   ndd.pcDriver = "ARYGON";
00104   ndd.pcPort = "/dev/ttyUSB0";
00105   ndd.uiSpeed = 115200;
00106   pnd = nfc_open(context, &ndd);
00107 #endif
00108 
00109   /* If specific device is wanted, i.e. a SCL3711 on USB */
00110 #if 0
00111   nfc_device_desc_t ndd;
00112   ndd.pcDriver = "PN533_USB";
00113   strcpy(ndd.acDevice, "SCM Micro / SCL3711-NFC&RW");
00114   pnd = nfc_open(context, &ndd);
00115 #endif
00116   nfc_connstring connstrings[MAX_DEVICE_COUNT];
00117   size_t szDeviceFound = nfc_list_devices(context, connstrings, MAX_DEVICE_COUNT);
00118 
00119   if (szDeviceFound == 0) {
00120     printf("No NFC device found.\n");
00121   }
00122 
00123   for (i = 0; i < szDeviceFound; i++) {
00124     nfc_target ant[MAX_TARGET_COUNT];
00125     pnd = nfc_open(context, connstrings[i]);
00126 
00127     if (pnd == NULL) {
00128       ERR("Unable to open NFC device: %s", connstrings[i]);
00129       continue;
00130     }
00131     if (nfc_initiator_init(pnd) < 0) {
00132       nfc_perror(pnd, "nfc_initiator_init");
00133       nfc_exit(context);
00134       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00135     }
00136 
00137     printf("NFC device: %s opened\n", nfc_device_get_name(pnd));
00138 
00139     nfc_modulation nm;
00140 
00141     nm.nmt = NMT_ISO14443A;
00142     nm.nbr = NBR_106;
00143     // List ISO14443A targets
00144     if ((res = nfc_initiator_list_passive_targets(pnd, nm, ant, MAX_TARGET_COUNT)) >= 0) {
00145       int n;
00146       if (verbose || (res > 0)) {
00147         printf("%d ISO14443A passive target(s) found%s\n", res, (res == 0) ? ".\n" : ":");
00148       }
00149       for (n = 0; n < res; n++) {
00150         print_nfc_target(&ant[n], verbose);
00151         printf("\n");
00152       }
00153     }
00154 
00155     nm.nmt = NMT_FELICA;
00156     nm.nbr = NBR_212;
00157     // List Felica tags
00158     if ((res = nfc_initiator_list_passive_targets(pnd, nm, ant, MAX_TARGET_COUNT)) >= 0) {
00159       int n;
00160       if (verbose || (res > 0)) {
00161         printf("%d Felica (212 kbps) passive target(s) found%s\n", res, (res == 0) ? ".\n" : ":");
00162       }
00163       for (n = 0; n < res; n++) {
00164         print_nfc_target(&ant[n], verbose);
00165         printf("\n");
00166       }
00167     }
00168 
00169     nm.nbr = NBR_424;
00170     if ((res = nfc_initiator_list_passive_targets(pnd, nm, ant, MAX_TARGET_COUNT)) >= 0) {
00171       int n;
00172       if (verbose || (res > 0)) {
00173         printf("%d Felica (424 kbps) passive target(s) found%s\n", res, (res == 0) ? ".\n" : ":");
00174       }
00175       for (n = 0; n < res; n++) {
00176         print_nfc_target(&ant[n], verbose);
00177         printf("\n");
00178       }
00179     }
00180 
00181     nm.nmt = NMT_ISO14443B;
00182     nm.nbr = NBR_106;
00183     // List ISO14443B targets
00184     if ((res = nfc_initiator_list_passive_targets(pnd, nm, ant, MAX_TARGET_COUNT)) >= 0) {
00185       int n;
00186       if (verbose || (res > 0)) {
00187         printf("%d ISO14443B passive target(s) found%s\n", res, (res == 0) ? ".\n" : ":");
00188       }
00189       for (n = 0; n < res; n++) {
00190         print_nfc_target(&ant[n], verbose);
00191         printf("\n");
00192       }
00193     }
00194 
00195     nm.nmt = NMT_ISO14443BI;
00196     nm.nbr = NBR_106;
00197     // List ISO14443B' targets
00198     if ((res = nfc_initiator_list_passive_targets(pnd, nm, ant, MAX_TARGET_COUNT)) >= 0) {
00199       int n;
00200       if (verbose || (res > 0)) {
00201         printf("%d ISO14443B' passive target(s) found%s\n", res, (res == 0) ? ".\n" : ":");
00202       }
00203       for (n = 0; n < res; n++) {
00204         print_nfc_target(&ant[n], verbose);
00205         printf("\n");
00206       }
00207     }
00208 
00209     nm.nmt = NMT_ISO14443B2SR;
00210     nm.nbr = NBR_106;
00211     // List ISO14443B-2 ST SRx family targets
00212     if ((res = nfc_initiator_list_passive_targets(pnd, nm, ant, MAX_TARGET_COUNT)) >= 0) {
00213       int n;
00214       if (verbose || (res > 0)) {
00215         printf("%d ISO14443B-2 ST SRx passive target(s) found%s\n", res, (res == 0) ? ".\n" : ":");
00216       }
00217       for (n = 0; n < res; n++) {
00218         print_nfc_target(&ant[n], verbose);
00219         printf("\n");
00220       }
00221     }
00222 
00223     nm.nmt = NMT_ISO14443B2CT;
00224     nm.nbr = NBR_106;
00225     // List ISO14443B-2 ASK CTx family targets
00226     if ((res = nfc_initiator_list_passive_targets(pnd, nm, ant, MAX_TARGET_COUNT)) >= 0) {
00227       int n;
00228       if (verbose || (res > 0)) {
00229         printf("%d ISO14443B-2 ASK CTx passive target(s) found%s\n", res, (res == 0) ? ".\n" : ":");
00230       }
00231       for (n = 0; n < res; n++) {
00232         print_nfc_target(&ant[n], verbose);
00233         printf("\n");
00234       }
00235     }
00236 
00237     nm.nmt = NMT_JEWEL;
00238     nm.nbr = NBR_106;
00239     // List Jewel targets
00240     if ((res = nfc_initiator_list_passive_targets(pnd, nm, ant, MAX_TARGET_COUNT)) >= 0) {
00241       int n;
00242       if (verbose || (res > 0)) {
00243         printf("%d Jewel passive target(s) found%s\n", res, (res == 0) ? ".\n" : ":");
00244       }
00245       for (n = 0; n < res; n++) {
00246         print_nfc_target(&ant[n], verbose);
00247         printf("\n");
00248       }
00249     }
00250     nfc_close(pnd);
00251   }
00252 
00253   nfc_exit(context);
00254   exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00255 }
